page.title: 20Community Centre
page.content: Th Community Centre was built in l974 close to the site of an old village hall dating from the early l920's. The centre is owned by Stenness Community Association which is made up of members from the parish elected annually. There are 14 members on the committee.The centre is hired by the school and is used for gym, music and drama.During the past year the hall has been used regularly by the Youth Club, Playgroup, SWRI, 'Slim and Trim', Drama Club, Community Council and from time to time by other organisations. The centre is regularly used for weddings.Usually the centre makes a profit but because of the decline in the popularity of country dances, last year it didn't. The secretary, Mrs. Lilias Mathers would like to see a Senior Citizens' Club using the centre regularly.
